slider1-text:
Grazie alla collaborazione con Namecase,
sicuro.com ti offre la migliore assistenza
per gestire la vendita o l'acquisto dei tuoi domini
slider2-text:
Protect yourself against scams from online payments
and offer more guarantees to your buyers!
slider3-text:
Acquista in modo sicuro! Manderemo il tuo pagamento al venditore solo
dopo che avrai ricevuto e controllato la merce!
slider4-text:
Unfortunately scams and fraud are common in online transactions.
The intermediary’s role played by sicuro.com offers guarantees for both buyers and sellers. Sellers will be able to verify the amount paid before sending the merchandise and buyers will be able to receive and inspect the merchandise before the seller is paid. Sicuro.com receives a maximum fee of 3% of the transaction vale for this service, starting from 5€ only!
slider5-text: Check out our prices and fees on the pages listed below; our easy to use fee calculator allows you to quickly evaluate the exact price of your transaction. Follow this link to learn more.
slider-lead:
Con sicuro.com acquisti e vendi online
in tutta sicurezza attraverso 5 facili step
